description:
Due to his relationship with All For One, Yuga Aoyama calls himself a villain, but Deku tells him that he can still be a hero and reaches a hand out to him. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment nous sommes devenus des héros
Diese Geschichte erzählt von der Zeit, bis wir alle zu Helden werden
Minna ga Hero ni Naru made no Monogatari
The Story of How We All Became Heroes
皆がヒーローになるまでの物語
